sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './About.css' import image from '../../images.jpg' import trainer1 from '../../fitness-trainer-1.jpg' import trainer2 from '../../fitness-trainer-2.jpg' import trainer3 from '../../fitness-trainer-3.jpg' import trainer4 from '../../fitness-trainer-4.jpg' import {MdFitnessCenter} from 'react-icons/md'; const About = () => { return (

Fitness and Mental Health

The only place you'll need for your fitness goals.

Who we are

We are a bunch of certified fitness trainers, here to help you get your dream physique sitting at your own home. You can get all kinds of programs here at reasonable prices. If you are consistent, we guarantee you to help achieve your goals.

Our Services

Fitness Training

Train with the best experts in bodybuilding field.

Mental health care

Train with the best experts in mental health field.

Power Yoga

Train with the best experts in bodybuilding field.

Cross training

Train with the best experts in mental health field.

{/* coaches */}

Meet Our Coaches

These are the best coaches in the field of fitness training.

Adam Anderson

Strength Training

Melissa Jones

Nutriton Expert

James Clark

Cardio Training

Alina Dames

Yoga Training

); }; export default About;
